name: S203 ORBIT EXODUS - Room Escape
description:
It is an “Room Escape Game” that can be played using simple controls. Many puzzles and challenges await you. Ultimately, what you will witness is…

-- How to Play--

・Tap
Touch the screen with your finger then lift.
Ex)Search, Use an Item, Push a Button, etc.

・Swipe
Slide your finger on the screen then lift.
Ex) Move out, Happenings, etc.
